mapper.select: SELECT user_id userId, user_pw userPw, user_level userLevel, user_active userActive FROM user WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND user_pw = #{userPw}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user ( user_id, user_pw, user_level, user_name, user_email, user_tel, user_gender, create_date, update_date, lastlogin_date ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userLevel}, #{userName}, #{userEmail}, #{userTel}, #{userGender}, NOW(), NOW(), NOW() )
